children.value: import { Form, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "sagan-ui";

<Playground>
  <Form>
    <FormGroup>
      <Label helper="This is a helper">Name</Label>
      <Input type="text" placeholder="placeholder" />
    </FormGroup>
    <FormGroup>
      <Label>Password</Label>
      <Input type="password" placeholder="placeholder" />
    </FormGroup>
    <FormGroup>
      <Label>Email</Label>
      <Input
        type="password"
        placeholder="placeholder"
        error="This is an error"
      />
    </FormGroup>
  </Form>
</Playground>
These configs applies to all Input elements on the application
